name: lunar-client-server-mappings
title: Lunar Client Server Mappings
description: Allows you to view Minecraft server mappings provided by Lunar Client!
author: tuchan

commands.name: view
commands.title: View Server Mappings
commands.description: View server mappings provided by Lunar Client!

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
